text:
I have made it a PR because some little things can be discussed :
- accuracy of haxby_decoding is impacted (now about 0.99) and I have changed the documentation accordingly
- LDA results in the "going further" part are impacted too : there was results using the entire dataset instead of restricting to face and houses

All generated figures are identical.
